hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Bakra:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said: "The sun and the moon are two signs amongst the signs of Allah and they do not eclipse because of the death of someone but Allah frightens His devotees with them

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم : «يُخَوِّفُ اللَّهُ عِبَادَهُ بِالْكُسُوفِ»
